title: Trump picks industry CEO Chris Wright to lead Energy department
shortDescription: Trump picked industry executive Chris Wright as his nominee to be Energy secretary and to join a new Council of National Energy.

title: Zelenskyy says war will end quicker under Donald Trump
shortDescription: On the battlefields of eastern Ukraine, Russia is now advancing at the fastest rate since the war's earliest days in 2022.

title: John Fetterman to Democrats: 'You really ought to pace yourselves'
shortDescription: Democratic Sen. John Fetterman warned his fellow party members in an interview that they can’t get “freaked out” over every move Trump makes.

title: How Trump's Pentagon pick Hegseth fell out of love with the US military
shortDescription: How Hegseth became an "anti-woke" advocate is still coming into view. But it is becoming increasingly clear that he came to a crossroads in January 2021.

title: Trump, GOP got a trifecta: But will there be any Republican pushback?
shortDescription: Even amid a unified GOP government, Trump will have to face intra-party detractors when he begins his second term in January.

title: Democrats faced a 2024 beating. Can their rising stars block a GOP trifecta?
shortDescription: After losing the White House and both chambers of Congress this November, Democrats in Congress are looking for a way forward as the minority.

title: Trump Cabinet updates: Steven Cheung, Karoline Leavitt, Sergio Gor
shortDescription: Donald Trump nominated longtime aide Steven Cheung to be his director of communications while opting Karoline Leavitt to be his press secretary.

title: Trump hires Karoline Leavitt as White House press secretary
shortDescription: Karoline Leavitt, a 27-year-old New Hampshire native, will have one of the most visible jobs in the new Trump administration.

title: Democratic governors brace for a second Trump administration
shortDescription: Many of Trump's campaign promises on energy, immigration, and LGBTQ+ policy are in direct opposition to the policy agendas of Democratic states.

title: Trump names Steven Cheung his White House communications director
shortDescription: Steven Cheung worked on Trump's 2016 and 2020 presidential campaigns and in Trump's first White House.

title: What to know about recess appointments as Trump voices his support
shortDescription: With President-elect Trump building his Cabinet, the idea of recess appointments has been floated, but what are they and how can they be used?

title: Before Musk, Trump tapped another mogul to cut costs. It ended badly
shortDescription: After his 2016 election, Trump tapped Wall Street raider Carl Icahn as a "regulatory reform" adviser. He soon quit under a cloud of controversy.

title: False claim Trump picked Kash Patel as CIA director | Fact check
shortDescription: Trump had not nominated anyone for the position of CIA director when the post was made. He nominated John Ratcliffe a day later.

title: Trump's picks vs Biden's: Who are Biden’s current Cabinet members?
shortDescription: As Trump has been announcing his incoming administration picks, a look at President Joe Biden's current Cabinet.

title: Why Trump cabinet pick says he was pulled from Biden inauguration duty
shortDescription: Donald Trump's pick for Secretary of Defense, Peter Hegseth, says National Guard superiors pulled him from 2021 inauguration deployment over a tattoo.

title: Trump 'victory' cologne hits resale market after a campaign of merch
shortDescription: A 'victory' cologne promoting Donald Trump is one item in a collection of merchandise released throughout 2024.

title: Jeffries calls Trumps nominations a 'distraction'
shortDescription: Representative Hakeem Jeffries spoke about defending social programs and called Donald Trumps cabinet nominations a "distraction."

title: Police: Sarasota man drove stolen car to Mar-a-Lago to talk to Trump
shortDescription: The man is the third person arrested at Trump's Mar-a-Lago Club in Palm Beach since a July 13 assassination attempt.

title: Partly false claim on Trump picks' ties to Project 2025 | Fact check
shortDescription: Trump has sought to distance himself from Project 2025, but two of his post-election hires are listed as contributors to the effort.

title: Trump's Defense secretary pick involved in 2017 sexual assault probe: Police
shortDescription: Donald Trump's Cabinet pick Pete Hegseth, a former Fox News host, was listed in a sexual assault investigation in Monterey, California in 2017.
